problem_names:
lemma epath_shift:
  assumes "epath (srs @- steps)"
  shows "epath steps"

theorem soundness:
  assumes f: "tfinite t" and w: "wf t"
  shows "ssat (fst (root t))"
translations:
lemma epath_shift:
  assumes "epath (srs @- steps)"
  shows "epath steps"

proof (prove)
using this:
  epath (srs @- steps)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. epath steps
by (induction srs arbitrary: steps) (auto elim: epath.cases)

theorem soundness:
  assumes f: "tfinite t" and w: "wf t"
  shows "ssat (fst (root t))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  tfinite t
  local.wf t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ssat (fst (tree.root t))

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>t'. t' |\<in>| cont t \<Longrightarrow> tfinite t';
        \<And>t'.
           \<lbrakk>t' |\<in>| cont t; local.wf t'\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> ssat (fst (tree.root t'));
        local.wf t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ssat (fst (tree.root t))

proof (state)
this:
  ?t'1 |\<in>| cont t \<Longrightarrow> tfinite ?t'1
  \<lbrakk>?t'1 |\<in>| cont t; local.wf ?t'1\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ssat (fst (tree.root ?t'1))
  local.wf t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>t'. t' |\<in>| cont t \<Longrightarrow> tfinite t';
        \<And>t'.
           \<lbrakk>t' |\<in>| cont t; local.wf t'\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> ssat (fst (tree.root t'));
        local.wf t\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ssat (fst (tree.root t))

by (rule local_soundness[of "snd (root t)" _ "fimage (fst o root) (cont t)"], insert tfinite)
      (fastforce elim!: wf.cases)+

proof (state)
this:
  ssat (fst (tree.root t))

goal:
No subgoals!
